name: Charge
comment: Maintains details of the charges that have been done after the billing runs for the specific billing cycle. The Billing system creates and maintains three different categories of charges: * Recurring Charges - Charges that recur during every cycle for an offer included in the agreement. * One-Time Charges - Charges resulting from a one-time activity, which can be from a customer management activity, a third-party activity, or a late payment in Amdocs Accounts Receivable. * Usage Charges - Charges resulting from a subscriber-initiated event, such as a phone call or Internet browsing.
vf short description: Maintains details of the charges that have been done after the billing runs for the specific billing cycle.

fields.name: ChargeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ChargeKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the charge in ALDM. Each charge key value represents a unique charge. BL1_CHARGE.CHARGE_SEQ_NO + BL1_CHARGE.CHARGE_CORRECTION_SEQ_NO//Generated Key on Charge Id and Charge Correction Sequence Number

fields.name: InvoiceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FinancialAccountSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PayChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChargeCodeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingCycleInstanceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChargeTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CurrencySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChargeOriginSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChargeId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the charge in the source system. BL1_CHARGE.CHARGE_SEQ_NO

fields.name: ChargeCorrectionSequenceNumber
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the correction to the charge. More than one correction can be made to the same charge. BL1_CHARGE.CHARGE_CORRECTION_SEQ_NO

fields.name: ChargeTotalAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the total charge amount. BL1_CHARGE.AMOUNT + BL1_TAX.TOTAL_TAX_AMT

fields.name: ChargeNetAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the net charge amount, excluding the tax amount for all the related tax. BL1_CHARGE.AMOUNT

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a charge becomes effective. This date is used for tax calculations. BL1_CHARGE.EFFECTIVE_DATE

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: RevenueTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CycleRunDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the billing period has started for the cycle, in which the customer has been charged. Lookup in Billing Cycle Instance for Cycle Run Date based on BL1_CHARGE.CYCLE_SEQ_NO

fields.name: CycleEndDate
fields.comment: Specifies the end date of the cycle, in which the customer has been charged. Lookup in Billing Cycle Instance for Cycle End Date based on BL1_CHARGE.CYCLE_SEQ_NO

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which the record was created in the source system. BL1_CHARGE_SYS_CREATION_DATE

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system BL1_CHARGE.SYS_UPDATE_DATE

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: DynamicAttributeList
fields.comment: List of comma-separated attributes as per to the charge type. The relevant attributes and the corresponding orders are determined as per to the charge type definition in the reference area. BL1_CHARGE.DYNAMIC_ATTRIBUTES

fields.name: BillingOfferId
fields.comment: Indicates the billing offer associated with the charge. BL1_CHARGE.OFFER

fields.name: ContractSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FrameworkAgreementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSiteSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingCycleSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
